data.message: I’ve reported four issues now and NONE of them have been reviewed. I recently unblocked my boyfriend, it’s been over a week, and NEITHER of us can send friend requests to each other. Facebook is how we connect with each other and both of our families and I need this problem resolved ASAP. I reported an issue over a year ago that still has yet to be reviewed. Is this the type of customer service that Facebook has? I’ve even sent a message to this page that hasn’t been opened and posted a question to the community. NOTHING.
